description:
A simple, secure, decentralized VPN mesh network solution


What's Changed
- allow set ipv4 network prefix on GUI. by @m1m1sha in #414
- optimize event log display on GUI. by @m1m1sha in #417
- fix peer rpc stop working because of mpsc tunnel close unexpectedly, causing routing problems. @KKRainbow in #418
- fix android crash. @KKRainbow in #418
- fix subnet proxy cannot be set on android. @KKRainbow in #418
Full Changelog: https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/compare/v2.0.2...v2.0.3
